channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Light being blocked by tree, 27th May
item.description:
Light is not properly visible due to tree growth. (Pic taken from Google earth as I was driving!) Tree needs pruning back for visibility…. Lights are on PE Way by Kingsmead Rd junction.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 11, Princess Elizabeth Way, Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Public right of way not sign., 27th May
item.description:
Footpath is over grown with vegetation. No clear path through farmland. No clear signs to follow path around

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gotherington Fields, Gotherington, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 3 deep potholes on Beaufort Road at Oakhurst Rise junction, 27th May
item.description:
There are 3 deep potholes on Beaufort Road at the junction with Oakhurst Rise. They have sharp edges so can damage tyres and are big enough to be dangerous for cyclists.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 3, Beaufort Road, Ewens Farm, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bamboo from, 2 Colwyn drive, is spreading, and coming up through tarmac pavement, reocurring issue, (tripping hazard), 27th May
item.description:
Bamboo, growing on pavement.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2, Colwyn Drive, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Other damage to pavement i.e. cobbles, raised mound/surface

item.title: Graffiti at Royal Well bus station, 27th May
item.description:
This is one example of junction boxes and other street furniture being marred by graffiti at the bus station. A poor welcome for people arriving into the town by bus.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Royal Crescent, Montpellier, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree roots damaging wall and driveway, 27th May
item.description:
The tree outside 283 Gloucester Road is causing damage to our wall and driveway. The damage has got significantly worse over the last year and the wall now has a large crack in it and the wall is being pushed up onto the railings causing damage to them as well. There is also damage to both our driveway and our neighbour's driveway at 281a (which we believe they have reported previously).

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 283, Gloucester Road, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Multiple potholes, 27th May
item.description:
Lots of potholes. Needs complete re-surfacing. Outside Ladies College
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Bayshill Road, Montpellier, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Cycle path marking not adequate, 27th May
item.description:
Cycle path markings when crossing junctions along the whole of princess elizabeth way are no longer clearly marked and so leaves ambiguity as to whether cars or cyclists have priority at these crossing points. This leads to dangerous situations of either cars or cycles travelling too fast and being unsure of priority
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Dormer Road, Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: General road marking and stud issues

item.title: This crossing has never worked correctly. The buttons used to stick in and now the crossing doesn’t work at all from the south side. It works fine on the north side. Thank you., 27th May
item.description:
Buttons do nothing on the south side (Briarfields side) Work fine on the north side. The crossing has had issues since installation. Mainly due to the buttons sticking. Thank you
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A40, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dangerous. Cannot see anything whizzing around the roundabout, 27th May
item.description:
As the summary. The grass on the roundabout is far too long, obscuring views for drivers.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Zoons Court Roundabout, Hucclecote, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
